creator: Pride Games
descriptionHtml:
Skibidi Toilets have attacked our dimension! The epic war between scary toilet man vs cameraman and speakerman has already begun! Join the camera man resistance and fight for our world in this action shooter game with RPG and roguelike elements. Survivor, the last battle was lost, most of the army was defeated, there were small detachments scattered around the city. Many people voluntarily without a fight went over to the side of the enemy. The Skibidi army is growing every hour. Take up arms and flush all the toilet heads to the music of “Skibidi bop dop yes”. Survivor, hold off the attack as long as you can, the big TV man 📺 are on their way. It's time to show who's in charge here!

An action shooter battle awaits you in a big city filled with hordes of scary toilet monsters and titan bosses, development of roguelike character skills and weapon upgrades in our survival mobile free game offline. The world is on the verge of destruction. The fate of all cameraman 🎥📷 depends only on you. Let the great battle with Skibidi Toilets begin!

🚽 DESTROY ALL TOILETS
There are many ways to destroy scary monsters in war. You can flush your head down the toilet, this works well against a small number of enemies. Guns work well against a large horde of skibidist. The game has many types of guns that can be improved. You can merge several guns into one to make it more powerful. Combine roguelike skills with guns and become invincible on the battlefield. Run and shoot to the song "Skibidi bop dop yes" and you will be invincible.

🚽 MERCENES - CAMERAMANS
Without improving abilities, equipment and guns, you cannot win the survival war. To do this, you will need a huge amount of currency that you need to earn on the battlefield during the attack and fight. There is an easy way to earn it. After the release of the imprisoned cameramans and speakerman, you can hire them. The currency will accumulate constantly. But be careful, scary toilet monsters can reprogram your comrades against you!

🚽 LIBERATION OF THE CITY
You have to free a huge number of quarters of the city and fight with thousands of Skibidi toilet heads in our survival mobile free game offline. Explore and attack every corner of the city. Always be prepared, because many dangers lie in wait in the alleys. You never know where in the city you will meet a titan boss. You can be in battle as a G-man, and with a three-headed toilet. Run and shoot to the song "Skibidi bop dop yes", the only way you can defeat them.

Skibidi Toilet: Monster War is an action shooter with RPG and roguelike elements that will let you smash hordes of scary toilet monsters nonstop. Survivor, the fate of all mankind is in your hands. Merge all guns, skills and abilities to destroy all enemies and don't let them surround you. Big TV man 📺 is on the way, hold on! We will win this Skibidi war of monsters vs camera man!

If you have questions, comments or suggestions, you can always write to our resistance cameraman 🎥📷. Email: help@pgstudio.io
descriptionShort: Scary Toilet Monsters are attacking! Fight for the Cameraman in the Skibidi War.
title: Skibidi Toilet: Monster War
